definition: contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system

sentences.english: Southern leaders were pleased with the anti-war movement in the North.
sentences.chinese: 南方领导人很高兴地看到北方的反战运动。

sentences.english: The promoters figured "peace" would link the anti-war sentiment to the rock concert.
sentences.chinese: 促进者们表示，“和平”将反战情绪带进摇滚音乐会。

sentences.english: Temple of Shadows recording sessions started in January 2004 at Mosh Studios in São Paulo.
sentences.chinese: 暗影录音寺反战工作室开始在圣保罗2004年1月。

sentences.english: And don't blame any of this on peacenik liberals.
sentences.chinese: 不要把这些都怪罪在反战自由人士身上。

sentences.english: A spokesman of the Anti-War Coalition charged Bush was a war criminal.
sentences.chinese: 反战联盟的一名发言人说，布什是一名战争罪犯。

sentences.english: The sum and substance of the speech was antiwar .
sentences.chinese: 这个演讲的主要内容是反战的。

sentences.english: Quite often you'll hear people talking about OFP2 almost as an anti-war game.
sentences.chinese: 你可能常会听到人们说闪2是一个反战游戏。

sentences.english: Several thousand joined an anti-war protest in Los Angeles.
sentences.chinese: 有几千人参加了洛杉矶的反战示威。

sentences.english: Justin Raimondo author and editorial director of Antiwar. com.
sentences.chinese: 贾斯廷莱曼多，作者，反战网站的社论编辑。

sentences.english: Bush hit me again for demonstrating against the Vietnam War in England.
sentences.chinese: 老布什总统又攻击我越战期间在英国参加反战示威。

sentences.english: Thousands of war protestors converged on Washington today.
sentences.chinese: 今天几千名反战者聚集在华胜顿。

sentences.english: Anyone who knows her doesn't think she's anti-military…
sentences.chinese: 认识她的没一个认为她是反战分子。

sentences.english: But as the decision to strike drags on, anti-war voices begin to grow louder.
sentences.chinese: 攻击行动拖宕日久，国内反战的声浪渐渐大了起来。

definition: nationalism/national self-determination/principle of nationalism, the first of Dr Sun Yat-sen's 孫中山|孙中山 Three Principles of the People 三民主義|三民主义 (at the time, meaning parity between China and the great powers)/racism
